issues.description: The UML in the problem statement declares Stock.add(String) to return void, but both the template and solution Stock.add methods return int. This mismatch between the specification and code can confuse students about the expected signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the UML with the code by changing the UML signature to '+add(String): int', or alter the template and solution to have 'public void add(String)' if a void return is intended.
